actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts, and Humanities

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Education use the 1980 census data in determining the amount of grants under title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Education should use the 1980 census data in determining the amount of basic grants to local educational agencies under title I (Financial Assistance to Meet the Special Educational Needs of Children) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Education use the 1980 census data in determining the amount of grants under title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.
